src:
Arsenal Memang Begitu, Susah Payah Bikin Gol Hanya untuk Kebobolan dengan Mudah
03 Nov 2019, 16:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arsenal sekali lagi membuang kesempatan untuk mengantongi tiga poin di Premier League. Mereka hanya bisa bermain imbang 1-1 ketika menjamu Wolverhampton, Sabtu (2/11/2019) malam WIB.
Memiliki striker tajam seperti Pierre-Emerick Aubemeyang ternyata tidak bisa dimanfaatkan Arsenal dengan baik. Unai Emery mengakui timnya bermasalah sering membuang-buang peluang begitu saja.
Hasil imbang ini merupakan hasil imbang beruntun di Premier League. Tiga laga terakhir Arsenal di Premier League buruk: kalah dari Sheffield, imbang dengan Crystal Palace, dan imbang dengan Wolves ini.
Tiga laga tersebut buruk, khususnya dua hasil imbang beruntun yang membuat fans kesal. Mengapa? Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Arsenal Indeed, Hardly Making Goals Just to Conceive Easily
Nov 3 2019, 16:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arsenal once again threw away the opportunity to pocket three points in the Premier League. They can only draw 1-1 when entertaining Wolverhampton, Saturday (11/02/2019) night WIB.
Having a sharp striker like Pierre-Emerick Aubemeyang apparently could not be used properly by Arsenal. Unai Emery admits that his team has problems often wasting opportunities.
This draw is a draw in the Premier League. Arsenal's last three matches in the Premier League were bad: losing to Sheffield, drawing with Crystal Palace, and drawing with these Wolves.
The three matches were bad, especially the two consecutive draws which made fans upset. Why? Read below, Bolaneters!
